lines.text: The landlord's threatened to throw us out.
What's he squawking about, we only owe for eight months.
Ah my fair beauty, open up thy curtains so that I might see your fair kisser.
[after Moe conks Curly in the head with a chisel, and then apologizes]
"Oui" ("We") should be more careful about what we do around here... Chisler!

[Moe has taken off Curly's hat after his beard fell off and then slaps him]
Oh you hit Santa Claus just for that no toys.
